content: गमनीय {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Accessible, approachable; विकारस्य गमनीयास्मि संवृत्ता <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Intelligible, easy to be comprehended. {@--3@} Fit to be practised or observed. {@--4@} Relating to sexual intercourse; गुरुस्त्री° <ls>Ms. 11. 103</ls> (पापं); for other senses see गम्य.
